parameters: Wait... I feel like I'm leaving something behind...
Oh, thank the stars! Adventurers! Are you here looking for the Lost Wizard?
Because, well... Yes, it's true. I am she.
I have studied alone in this tower of mine for generations... Why, I recall watching the Rokkas Plains burn from up here as the demons came...
Which is why I do so adore having company...
\C[13]After all... There's only so much research I can do without live subjects...
\C[13]I- I'm losing my grip on this body!!
...Wait, where am I? \!...And what am I wearing?
But... I thought the Princess was someone else...
\!This may be a bizarre question, but... what year is it?
1200 AG?! \!I've been possessed for that long?!
Although... Now that I'm trying to remember anything else... I can't. It's all a blur...
I can't even remember... my name...
Oh, um, I'm sorry, I've been terribly rude...
I just... I'm not sure what to do...
\!Actually, wait! Would you be willing to take me with you?
I might not have any real training, but... I'm sure I can help somehow!
Although... I don't really know what you should call me...
\N[6]...? Is that a common name in these times...?
Very well, then! From now on, I'm \N[6]! \!Thank you!
There's just one last thing... these musty old clothes. Do you have any spare clothing?
I'm really, really grateful... I'll try to pay you back somehow!
\lsoffBad End "Zombies" was added to the Journal!
\lsoffBad End "Spell Spirits" was added to the Journal!
\lsoffBad End "Soulgems" was added to the Journal!
\lsoffBad End "Lost Wizard" was added to the Journal!

\}...Such a naughty little idol~♥
...Can't do anything... but dream of stroking my cock...♥

\}...Such a naughty little crystal~♥
...Can't do anything... but dream of rubbing my pussy...♥
...What took you so long? Trying to get out of paying me...?
Carry me around in your pocket... I'm just a worthless little trinket~♥
Oh! Uhh... Heh heh... Hi again~!
...At last. Take that long again to restore me and I'll make you a permanent addition to the Chateau...
Good Goddess almighty, that was one of the strangest things...
Thank you... That was a sort of immortality I'd much rather forego...
Oh, that's right! There was supposed to be something important in here...
\lsoffThe Green Tome is now in your possession! \|\|\|\|\|\|\|
